name: myMzone
tag_list: mymzone, markets, london, handmade, unique, products, camden-market, spitalfields-market, brick-lane-market
overview:
www.myMzone.com is an online marketplace curated with uniqueness and quirkiness of London’s traditional markets.

myMzone (My Market Zone) is an online community-based project that gathers products from traditional markets in London, giving you the unique and authentic shopping experience of the place.

At the moment, myMzone features products from local merchants in traditional markets in London like Camden, Portobello, Spitalfields, Brick Lane, Greenwich Market, Covent Garden, Sunday Up Market, Pop-Up Vintage, Borough market and a few alternative markets around the UK

The concept behind myMzone was inspired by London 2012. There will be a large influx of tourists in London from all over the world during the Olympics. This will give a great chance to the local markets to increase their exposure and visibility.
